details.name: Footlogger
details.potential: This device has a potential workplace benefit for health because it can help athletes develop an ideal weight placement during exercise, and can also be used in medicine for gait assessment, fall detection, exercise routine analysis and early prediction of dementia or spinal disease.

details.name: 4D Force
details.potential: This device has potential workplace benefits in training as it would offer an augmented virtual experience to recreate a real work environment. It can also improve health as it can recognize opportunities for changes in lifestyle that would positively impact the user's mental and physical health. Finally, the technology can enhance productivity by improving a person's ability to perform a job.

details.name: Viiiiva
details.potential: This device has health-related workplace potential benefits as it allows its users to better understand and manage their physical condition and mental well-being.

details.name: IPCS ID-Badge, uTag, Asset Tag
details.potential: The device has potential safety applications as it is designed to protect lone workers thanks to 3 remotely programmable buttons and an accelerometer based on non-movement and man down alarms.

details.name: Smart Run
details.potential: This device can improve health in the workplace by providing a better understanding of the wearer's physical condition, and an opportunity for improving physical and mental health.

details.name: Agent Smartwatch
details.potential: This device carries workplace potential in communication, as it would facilitate remote exchanges between employees and the organization.

details.name: Air Scouter
details.potential: This device has workplace potential in communication as it would maximize the exchange of information between employees and the organization. It can also improve productivity by facilitating devices' assembly process and remote operation support.

details.name: Amiigo
details.potential: This device carries health workplace potential as it can improve users' physical and mental health by providing information about their sleep cycle, which would diminish fatigue-related risks on the work site.

details.name: AquaPulse
details.potential: This device has health and safety potential applications as it can reduce bodily harm caused by diving or swimming incidents, and improve performance state during exercise.

details.name: Atheer One
details.potential: The device has some training potential as it can recreate a virtual version of a workplace and allow "real-life" training. It can also improve productivity by allowing a faster and more efficient training, as well as an easy hand-free access to important information.

details.name: Athos
details.potential: The system has some health and safety related workplace potential, as it allows performance tracking and improvement of physical activity, to reduce harm and risks on the work site.

details.name: Atlas
details.potential: This device carries safety and health workplace potential applications as it helps with the physical well-being and performance of workers, and also prevents some health-related accidents from occurring.

details.name: Glyph
details.potential: The device can be used as a training tool; it would maximize the "real life" conditions of a training practice by recreating a virtual workplace setting without the dangers, costs or other impediments associated with it. It also has some potential for workers productivity, as it allows a hand-free and instant access to critical information, projected directly into the user's retina.

details.name: AWatch
details.potential: The team at Vandrico has worked directly with the AWatch and considers it a viable option for communicating critical information to workers. Since the watch can operate independently of a phone, it can be used as a reliable source of alerts and critical situational awareness. The watch is fairly rugged and completely waterproof and the battery can comfortably last through a full 12 hour work-shift.

details.name: B1
details.potential: This device carries safety and health workplace potential applications as it helps with the physical well-being and performance of workers, and also prevents some health-related accidents from occurring.

details.name: Be Bionic
details.potential: This device carries potential for workers' productivity as it would allow amputees to perform an array of job that would not usually be accessible to them, or it would improve their abilities on their current job. Also, BeBionic helps with safety on the work site by allowing a more accurate maneuver of the equipment, for example.

details.name: Bluetooth Gloves
details.potential: BEARTek Gloves have workplace potential in communication as they allow easy access to communication features such as calls and messages. They also have potential for productivity by providing an easy access to information, as well as for safety because they can be used as protection gloves.

details.name: BIA Sports Watch
details.potential: This watch has potential as a communication device as it allows SOS alerts. Its GPS feature also makes it a security tool, allowing easy traceability of the device. Finally, the sports watch features make it a great physical health measurement system.

details.name: Bioharness 3
details.potential: The device carries health and safety related workplace applications as it allows tracking and improvement of physical health, and can be used to prevent bodily harm to occur.

details.name: Nymi
details.potential: This device has security-related workplace applications as it allows the protection of private and critical information, as well as assets.

details.name: BioPatch
details.potential: This device offers health-related potential workplace applications as it allows tracking, measurement and control of critical body data.

details.name: Link
details.potential: This device carries potential workplace applications related to health as it allows tracking, measurement and control of critical body data.

details.name: BPM Physio
details.potential: The device can be used in professional physical training, and also carries safety benefits as it allows tracking, measurement and control of critical body data.

details.name: BSX Athletics
details.potential: The device can improve productivity in the workplace by improving physical aptitudes. It can also be used as a training tool by athletes, for example, to better understand body data and enhance performance. Finally, BSX can prevent bodily harm to occur by measuring and controlling critical physiological data.

details.name: BTS Surface EMG
details.potential: The device can improve health in the workplace as it reduces the risk for bodily harm. It can also be used as a training tool for athletes. Finally, BTS Surface EMG has potential benefits for productivity in the workplace as it would optimize muscles and joints use, reducing opportunities for energy loss and occlusal interferences.

details.name: D01, D02
details.potential: The device can improve safety in the workplace as it work as a safety helmet. It can also serve as a communication device by transmitting audio informations to the wearer and allowing remote communication. Finally, Buhel's device can improve productivity by offering time-saving applications which are accessible instantly and in a hand-free manner.

details.name: SG04
details.potential: The device has the potential to facilitate communication in the workplace by enabling users to interact remotely via superior audio experience and in a hand-free manner. Ultimately, this will make the work tasks easier and quicker to perform, directly impacting productivity. Finally, the bone conduction technology allows the users to be aware of their surroundings, while being able to clearly hear audio input.

details.name: G31, G33
details.potential: This device has the potential to improve productivity in the workplace by facilitating access to critical information in a time-saving and hand-free manner. It also improves communication abilities of users. Finally, the bone conduction technology improves safety by enabling the users to wear ear-protections for example, without preventing proper audition.

details.name: G-Shock GB-6900
details.potential: The device carries workplace potential for productivity and communication as it provides easy access to phones' features as well as instant alerts, allowing the user to access critical information in a time-saving and efficient manner.

details.name: CastAR
details.potential: This device can work as a training tool by virtually recreating a workplace setting, eliminating real-life situation's risks and costs for example. It can also be used to improve productivity by allowing the users to visualize critical information directly projected on the lens, which could save time and improve accuracy of operations.

details.name: Nanotrak
details.potential: This device can be used for cost reduction as it would prevent bodily harm and injury-related costs. It would also improve health of workers and athletes by controlling and measuring critical physiological data. Nanotrack can also work as a training tool by offering opportunities for performance improvement. Finally, the device carries potential in the workplace as a productivity enhancer, by allowing a more efficient and sustainable physical effort.

details.name: OptimEye S5
details.potential: This device has potential as a cost-reduction tool because it can prevent injury-related costs. In the same manner it can be used as a safety device by warning athletes and coaches about improper training practices that could lead to injury for example. It can also serve as a training tool and identify the personalized training programs that are most appropriate for the user. Finally, Optimeye S5 can benefit health by alerting of any unusual physical data.

details.name: Cinemizer OLED
details.potential: The device can impact productivity in the workplace by allowing users to access critical data in a hand-free manner, which can improve response-time and quality of operations. Also, Cinemizer OLED can be used as a training tool: it can recreate a virtual workplace setting for a safer and more accurate version of the real-life on-site training.

details.name: Cogito
details.potential: This device can improve productivity in the workplace by allowing a quick access to critical information in a non-disruptive way. This can ultimately increase efficiency by decreasing response-time. Cogito Watch can also enhance communication by providing the user with an easy way to keep in touch with other workers.

details.name: Cookoo
details.potential: This device can improve productivity in the workplace by allowing a quick access to critical information in a non-disruptive way. This can ultimately increase efficiency by decreasing response-time. Cookoo Watch can also enhance communication by providing the user with an easy way to keep in touch with other workers.

details.name: Cuff
details.potential: This device can improve safety in the workplace by locating the wearer in case of distress or danger. It also has some security potential as it allows people in the Cuff network to keep in touch with colleagues and workers.

details.name: HAL
details.potential: The device has health-related potential for the workplace as it would allow physically-impaired people to perform physically demanding jobs, slowing improving their own abilities and enhancing their capacities. The exosuit can also help with productivity as it facilitates heavy- duty tasks, reducing the time and labour needs for the job. Finally, the device can be useful in training as it can help with physical rehab for injured workers for example.

details.name: DorsaVi
details.potential: This device can be used for cost-reduction, safety and health in the workplace as it prevents bodily harm and allows maintenance of health, decreasing time and money spent on addressing work-related physical problems. Finally, it can be used for training reasons as a tool to promote safe management and usage of the body abilities when at work.

details.name: Duo Fertility
details.potential: This device has potential in the medical workplace as a cost-reduction and productivity tool, because it reduces maximizes the chances to get pregnant and diminishes regular treatment or waiting time. It also has potential application for health as it allows the woman to identify her body's optimal time to fall pregnant.

details.name: EasyWakeMe
details.potential: This device can be used in the workplace to maximize health, safety and productivity. It can ensure workers get enough sleep of proper quality, in order for them to be sharp and focus on the work site. This could reduce hazards and bodily harm, and maintain healthy workers.

details.name: Ekso
details.potential: This exoskeleton has the potential to enhance health by allowing the workers to execute heavy-duty tasks more easily, or allowing people with spinal injury to slowly rehabilitate by performing regular tasks with assistance of the suit. It can also help productivity as it betters workers' physical shape and allow them to perform physically demanding tasks more efficiently. Finally, Ekso Bionics can be used for training purposes when used as a physical rehab tool.

details.name: Move
details.potential: This device has potential as a training tool because it can be used by professional athletes during their training sessions. In this sense, it will impact their productivity as it will maximize their physical performances. Finally, it has the potential to protect health because it can prevent bodily harm to occur thanks to thorough data analysis.

details.name: Pulse
details.potential: This device has potential as a training tool because it can be used by professional athletes during their training sessions. In this sense, it will impact their productivity as it will maximize their physical performances. Finally, it has the potential to protect health because it can prevent bodily harm to occur thanks to thorough data analysis, for both athletes and regular daily users.

details.name: eLocator Checkpoint
details.potential: This device can be used as a security tool in the workplace as it will allow the user/owner to locate any human or material asset.

details.name: EPOC Neuroheadset
details.potential: The device can be used as a training tool while allowing remote control of electronics. This handsfree technology of the mind has the ability to improve productivity by allowing easier multitasking, for example. It can also better mental health by allowing a better understanding of the human brain.

details.name: Moverio BT-200
details.potential: This heads up display can be used as a training tool by re-creating a hazard-free work and realistic work environment. It can also be used as a device to enhance productivity because it would allow the user to visualize important data in real-time and in a hand-free manner.

details.name: PS-500
details.potential: This device can be used for improving health and productivity of users in the workplace. Indeed, it will allow a better understanding and monitoring of bodily data to keep workers healthy, happy and fully efficient.

details.name: PS-100
details.potential: This device can be used for improving health and productivity of users in the workplace. Indeed, it will allow a better understanding and monitoring of bodily data to keep workers healthy, happy and fully efficient. It can also help maximizing performances of professional athletes for example.

details.name: Digital Eye Glasses
details.potential: This heads up display can be used as a training tool by re-creating a hazard-free work and realistic work environment. It can also be used as a device to enhance productivity because it would allow the user to visualize important data in real-time and in a hand-free manner, allowing precise work and multitasking.

details.name: HDR CYbernetic Welding Helmet
details.potential: This tool has potential as a training tool because it could reproduce workplace environment and allow training before the workers actually get on the site. It can also prevent any bodily harm, which makes it a safety device. Finally, it can improve productivity by enhancing the user's vision.

details.name: Zazzi
details.potential: This device can help with remote and instant communication in the workplace. It can also improve productivity by allowing a discrete and non-disruptive access to messages and calls.

details.name: Readiband
details.potential: Fatigue Avoidance Scheduling Tool (FAST), the software platform behind the ReadiBand, was developed by the United States Air Force to address the problem of aircrew fatigue in aircrew flight scheduling. FAST was principally designed to mitigate risk. Combined with their wearble ReadiBand, companies can use fatigue analytics and data visualization to understand areas of risk and implement measures to improve operational safety. Additionally, this technology can be used as a retrospective analysis tool to determine if fatigue was a cause of a past lost-time injury. Lastly, this technology can be used to validate whether a company’s scheduling had an impact on risk-mitigation. The principle benefit of this technology is the potential to reduce fatigue-related lost-time injuries. With an in-depth study and validated scientific data, a company should be able to provide their insurers with a report indicating improvements in safety and risk-mitigation based on scheduling and workload. This report could form the basis of a reduction in premiums, depending on a company’s negotiating power.

details.name: Filip
details.potential: This device has potential application in the workplace as a security device which would allow the localization of any human asset. Also, it can be used as a user-friendly communication tool.

details.name: Fin
details.potential: This device can be used to enhance productivity in the workplace by allowing remote and instant command of electronic devices. It also has the potential to improve communication when linked to a smartphone, for example.

details.name: Tracker
details.potential: This tool can be used in the canine police or security sectors for example, and allow a better monitoring of the dogs' health to improve productivity on the work site.

details.name: Flex
details.potential: This device can be used for improving health and productivity of users in the workplace. Indeed, it will allow a better understanding and monitoring of bodily data to keep workers healthy, happy and fully efficient. It can also help maximizing performances of professional athletes for example.

details.name: Fitbit One
details.potential: This device can be used for improving health and productivity of users in the workplace. Indeed, it will allow a better understanding and monitoring of bodily data to keep workers healthy, happy and fully efficient. It can also help maximizing performances of professional athletes for example. Finally, the sleep monitor could decrease fatigue-related workplace hazards.

details.name: Orb
details.potential: This device can be used for improving health and productivity of users in the workplace. Indeed, it will allow a better understanding and monitoring of bodily data to keep workers healthy, happy and fully efficient. It can also help maximizing performances of professional athletes for example. Finally, the sleep monitor could decrease fatigue-related workplace hazards.

details.name: Fujitsu Glove-Style Wearable Device
details.potential: This wearable tech glove can improve communication in the workplace by allowing remote and instant control of electronics and smart devices. It can also enhance productivity by enabling the user to multitask easily, and access more electronic functions in less time.

details.company: Japanese Institute of Advanced Media Arts and Sciences (IAMAS) and Paris Miki Holdings Inc
details.name: Fun'iki Ambient Glasses
details.potential: This device can improve productivity in the workplace as it would allow a hand-free and instant access to critical information directly projected into the user's eye. Also, it carries communication potential by transmitting Morse Code messages.

details.name: Game Golf
details.potential: This device designed specifically for golfers can be used as a training and productivity tool in the professional golfing sector. Indeed, the Game Golf will enable users to perfect their style and technique in order to practice and maximize their performance on the green. Finally, by identifying proper positions and techniques while golfing, the device can help preserve the physical health of its user.

details.name: Approach S3
details.potential: This device designed specifically for golfers can be used as a training and productivity tool in the professional golfing sector. Indeed, the Garmin Approach S3 will enable users to perfect their style and technique in order to practice and maximize their performance on the green. Finally, by identifying proper positions and techniques while golfing, the device can help preserve the physical health of its user.

details.name: Forerunner 910XT
details.potential: When used in a professional sport setting, this device can improve training by analyzing the user's practices and suggestions ways to improve them. In this way, it will enhance productivity - or physical performance - in the longer term. Finally, the data collected, stored and analyzed can be used to help preserve the physical health of its user.

details.name: Vivo
details.potential: Garmin Vivofit can be used to improve safety in the workplace thanks to sleep patterns analysis leading to fatigue and risk avoidance. Collection and study of bodily data can also help in preserving physical health of workers. Finally, as healthier and rested worker can potentially provide work in greater quantity and/or quality, the device can ultimately maximize productivity.

details.name: Ring
details.potential: This device can be used for security purposes in the work place as it secures access to smart devices. Also, it enhances communication by allowing the contact card to be shared with other NFC-enabled devices' users, for a convenient access.

details.name: iBitz
details.potential: This device can improve health while used on the job site and outside of work as well. Employees can start being more conscious about their exercise level and improve their physical and mental health. Also, healthier and happier workers can potentially improve their performance at work, which provides Geopalz iBitz with the potential to increase productivity.

details.name: GlassUp
details.potential: This device can be used for training in the workplace as it can display information directly in front of the user's eyes. Workers would be able to read warning texts from their manager when they are about to mishandle an equipment for example. Also, communication can be enhanced by GlassUp because it allows easy access to smart phones' features in a hand free and instant manner. Finally, the device has potential to improve productivity because it quickens response time to incoming calls and texts, and promotes multitasking by freeing the users' hands.

details.name: GoBe
details.potential: GoBe can be used to improve safety in the workplace thanks to heart rate analysis, which can potentially prevent heart problems to occur. Collection and study of bodily data can also help in preserving physical health of workers. Also, as healthier and rested worker can potentially provide work in greater quantity and/or quality, the device can ultimately maximize productivity. Finally, improving workers' health can reduce costs by diminishing the spending on leave days, insurance and health care for example.

details.name: Glass
details.potential:
The potential of using this computing device for workplace scenarios is almost infinite. Companies can leverage this device to benefit from hands-free communication, image and video recording, on-demand knowledge, location-based data collection, and three-dimensional augmented reality. Any of these tools can aid a company in data automation and empower real-time analytics of a workforce.
One example of a safety application is combining the GPS location capabilities with the known danger areas on a worksite to increase awareness. When a user enters the “danger zone”, a simple notification can pop up and alert the user of required PPE (Personal Protective Equipment). The notification could ask the user if he or she would like to see the company’s procedures for that particular area of the site. This solution could be easily built in to the device and would be ideal for training purposes.
One example of a productivity application is using the GPS location capabilities with the camera and voice recording to automate field-data collection. When a user is doing routine data collection around the site, the device could be used as a tool for capturing the data and automatically uploading the information to the company’s system. This translates into faster analytics and improved efficiency.
The principle benefit of this technology is tough to define since there are so many applications that could offer a significant ROI. Like SmartPhones and tablets, the largest impact will come from the applications written by the development community or customized platforms that integrate with a company’s system.

details.name: GOQii
details.potential: Collection and study of bodily data by the device can help prevent mental and physical health of wemployees. GOQii Band can then be used to improve safety in the workplace, by reducing bodily harm due to unfitness of the users. Finally, as healthier and rested worker can potentially provide work in greater quantity and/or quality, the device can ultimately maximize productivity.

details.name: Iota
details.potential: The Iota can be used for tracking people or items on a worksite and can be used for geofencing (e.g: alerting people that they are entering a rock blasting zone on a mine site). In a location with no major sources of interference, like an open pit mine, the Iota home base can cover a distance of 4 miles.

details.name: Reign
details.potential: API not available for developers.

details.name: Kidswatcher
details.potential: The Kidswatcher could be used to track children in school, daycare, family outings, or at any time where there is the potential for children to become lost.

details.name: Move
details.potential: All sensor data is accessible via the official API.

details.name: M1
details.potential: The M1 could be used to receive simple text based alerts from a smartphone. This would increase efficiency in communication.

details.name: Jet
details.potential: SDK and API available for developers.

details.name: Z-Watch
details.potential: The SmartQ Z-Watch can act as an excellent tool for communicating mission critical information to front-line workers. Its durable, waterproof casing enables it in out-door environments. Mission critical information can be communicated to the watch over a wireless network. An internal vibrator can act as an excellent way to get a workers attention even when they are distracted with other tasks.

details.potential: The ZGPAX S5 can act as an excellent tool for communicating mission critical information to front-line workers. Mission critical information can be communicated to the watch over a wireless network.

details.name: HAL
details.potential: The device has health-related potential for the workplace as it would allow physically-impaired people to perform physically demanding jobs, slowing improving their own abilities and enhancing their capacities. The exosuit can also help with productivity as it facilitates heavy- duty tasks, reducing the time and labour needs for the job. Finally, the device can be useful in training as it can help with physical rehab for injured workers for example.

details.name: DorsaVi
details.potential: This device can be used for cost-reduction, safety and health in the workplace as it prevents bodily harm and allows maintenance of health, decreasing time and money spent on addressing work-related physical problems. Finally, it can be used for training reasons as a tool to promote safe management and usage of the body abilities when at work.

details.name: Duo Fertility
details.potential: This device has potential in the medical workplace as a cost-reduction and productivity tool, because it reduces maximizes the chances to get pregnant and diminishes regular treatment or waiting time. It also has potential application for health as it allows the woman to identify her body's optimal time to fall pregnant.

details.name: EasyWakeMe
details.potential: This device can be used in the workplace to maximize health, safety and productivity. It can ensure workers get enough sleep of proper quality, in order for them to be sharp and focus on the work site. This could reduce hazards and bodily harm, and maintain healthy workers.

details.name: Ekso
details.potential: This exoskeleton has the potential to enhance health by allowing the workers to execute heavy-duty tasks more easily, or allowing people with spinal injury to slowly rehabilitate by performing regular tasks with assistance of the suit. It can also help productivity as it betters workers' physical shape and allow them to perform physically demanding tasks more efficiently. Finally, Ekso Bionics can be used for training purposes when used as a physical rehab tool.

details.name: Move
details.potential: This device has potential as a training tool because it can be used by professional athletes during their training sessions. In this sense, it will impact their productivity as it will maximize their physical performances. Finally, it has the potential to protect health because it can prevent bodily harm to occur thanks to thorough data analysis.

details.name: Pulse
details.potential: This device has potential as a training tool because it can be used by professional athletes during their training sessions. In this sense, it will impact their productivity as it will maximize their physical performances. Finally, it has the potential to protect health because it can prevent bodily harm to occur thanks to thorough data analysis, for both athletes and regular daily users.

details.name: eLocator Checkpoint
details.potential: This device can be used as a security tool in the workplace as it will allow the user/owner to locate any human or material asset.

details.name: EPOC Neuroheadset
details.potential: The device can be used as a training tool while allowing remote control of electronics. This handsfree technology of the mind has the ability to improve productivity by allowing easier multitasking, for example. It can also better mental health by allowing a better understanding of the human brain.

details.name: Moverio BT-200
details.potential: This heads up display can be used as a training tool by re-creating a hazard-free work and realistic work environment. It can also be used as a device to enhance productivity because it would allow the user to visualize important data in real-time and in a hand-free manner.

details.name: PS-500
details.potential: This device can be used for improving health and productivity of users in the workplace. Indeed, it will allow a better understanding and monitoring of bodily data to keep workers healthy, happy and fully efficient.

details.potential: This device can be used for improving health and productivity of users in the workplace. Indeed, it will allow a better understanding and monitoring of bodily data to keep workers healthy, happy and fully efficient. details.name: Digital Eye Glasses
details.potential: This heads up display can be used as a training tool by re-creating a hazard-free work and realistic work environment. It can also be used as a device to enhance productivity because it would allow the user to visualize important data in real-time and in a hand-free manner, allowing precise work and multitasking.

details.name: HDR CYbernetic Welding Helmet
details.potential: This tool has potential as a training tool because it could reproduce workplace environment and allow training before the workers actually get on the site. It can also prevent any bodily harm, which makes it a safety device. Finally, it can improve productivity by enhancing the user's vision.

details.name: Zazzi
details.potential: This device can help with remote and instant communication in the workplace. It can also improve productivity by allowing a discrete and non-disruptive access to messages and calls.

details.name: Readiband
details.potential: Fatigue Avoidance Scheduling Tool (FAST), the software platform behind the ReadiBand, was developed by the United States Air Force to address the problem of aircrew fatigue in aircrew flight scheduling. FAST was principally designed to mitigate risk. Combined with their wearble ReadiBand, companies can use fatigue analytics and data visualization to understand areas of risk and implement measures to improve operational safety. Additionally, this technology can be used as a retrospective analysis tool to determine if fatigue was a cause of a past lost-time injury. Lastly, this technology can be used to validate whether a company’s scheduling had an impact on risk-mitigation. The principle benefit of this technology is the potential to reduce fatigue-related lost-time injuries. With an in-depth study and validated scientific data, a company should be able to provide their insurers with a report indicating improvements in safety and risk-mitigation based on scheduling and workload. This report could form the basis of a reduction in premiums, depending on a company’s negotiating power.

details.name: Filip
details.potential: This device has potential application in the workplace as a security device which would allow the localization of any human asset. Also, it can be used as a user-friendly communication tool.

details.name: Fin
details.potential: This device can be used to enhance productivity in the workplace by allowing remote and instant command of electronic devices. It also has the potential to improve communication when linked to a smartphone, for example.

details.name: Fujitsu Glove-Style Wearable Device
details.potential: This wearable tech glove can improve communication in the workplace by allowing remote and instant control of electronics and smart devices. It can also enhance productivity by enabling the user to multitask easily, and access more electronic functions in less time.

details.company: Japanese Institute of Advanced Media Arts and Sciences (IAMAS) and Paris Miki Holdings Inc
details.name: Fun'iki Ambient Glasses
details.potential: This device can improve productivity in the workplace as it would allow a hand-free and instant access to critical information directly projected into the user's eye. Also, it carries communication potential by transmitting Morse Code messages.

details.name: Game Golf
details.potential: This device designed specifically for golfers can be used as a training and productivity tool in the professional golfing sector. Indeed, the Game Golf will enable users to perfect their style and technique in order to practice and maximize their performance on the green. Finally, by identifying proper positions and techniques while golfing, the device can help preserve the physical health of its user.

details.name: Approach S3
details.potential: This device designed specifically for golfers can be used as a training and productivity tool in the professional golfing sector. Indeed, the Garmin Approach S3 will enable users to perfect their style and technique in order to practice and maximize their performance on the green. Finally, by identifying proper positions and techniques while golfing, the device can help preserve the physical health of its user.

details.name: Forerunner 910XT
details.potential: When used in a professional sport setting, this device can improve training by analyzing the user's practices and suggestions ways to improve them. In this way, it will enhance productivity - or physical performance - in the longer term. Finally, the data collected, stored and analyzed can be used to help preserve the physical health of its user.

details.name: Vivo
details.potential: Garmin Vivofit can be used to improve safety in the workplace thanks to sleep patterns analysis leading to fatigue and risk avoidance. Collection and study of bodily data can also help in preserving physical health of workers. Finally, as healthier and rested worker can potentially provide work in greater quantity and/or quality, the device can ultimately maximize productivity.

details.name: Ring
details.potential: This device can be used for security purposes in the work place as it secures access to smart devices. Also, it enhances communication by allowing the contact card to be shared with other NFC-enabled devices' users, for a convenient access.

details.name: iBitz
details.potential: This device can improve health while used on the job site and outside of work as well. Employees can start being more conscious about their exercise level and improve their physical and mental health. Also, healthier and happier workers can potentially improve their performance at work, which provides Geopalz iBitz with the potential to increase productivity.

details.name: GlassUp
details.potential: This device can be used for training in the workplace as it can display information directly in front of the user's eyes. Workers would be able to read warning texts from their manager when they are about to mishandle an equipment for example. Also, communication can be enhanced by GlassUp because it allows easy access to smart phones' features in a hand free and instant manner. Finally, the device has potential to improve productivity because it quickens response time to incoming calls and texts, and promotes multitasking by freeing the users' hands.

details.name: GoBe
details.potential: GoBe can be used to improve safety in the workplace thanks to heart rate analysis, which can potentially prevent heart problems to occur. Collection and study of bodily data can also help in preserving physical health of workers. Also, as healthier and rested worker can potentially provide work in greater quantity and/or quality, the device can ultimately maximize productivity. Finally, improving workers' health can reduce costs by diminishing the spending on leave days, insurance and health care for example.

details.name: Glass
details.potential:
The potential of using this computing device for workplace scenarios is almost infinite. Companies can leverage this device to benefit from hands-free communication, image and video recording, on-demand knowledge, location-based data collection, and three-dimensional augmented reality. Any of these tools can aid a company in data automation and empower real-time analytics of a workforce.
One example of a safety application is combining the GPS location capabilities with the known danger areas on a worksite to increase awareness. When a user enters the “danger zone”, a simple notification can pop up and alert the user of required PPE (Personal Protective Equipment). The notification could ask the user if he or she would like to see the company’s procedures for that particular area of the site. This solution could be easily built in to the device and would be ideal for training purposes.
One example of a productivity application is using the GPS location capabilities with the camera and voice recording to automate field-data collection. When a user is doing routine data collection around the site, the device could be used as a tool for capturing the data and automatically uploading the information to the company’s system. This translates into faster analytics and improved efficiency.
The principle benefit of this technology is tough to define since there are so many applications that could offer a significant ROI. Like SmartPhones and tablets, the largest impact will come from the applications written by the development community or customized platforms that integrate with a company’s system.

details.name: GOQii
details.potential: Collection and study of bodily data by the device can help prevent mental and physical health of wemployees. GOQii Band can then be used to improve safety in the workplace, by reducing bodily harm due to unfitness of the users. Finally, as healthier and rested worker can potentially provide work in greater quantity and/or quality, the device can ultimately maximize productivity.

details.name: Iota
details.potential: The Iota can be used for tracking people or items on a worksite and can be used for geofencing (e.g: alerting people that they are entering a rock blasting zone on a mine site). In a location with no major sources of interference, like an open pit mine, the Iota home base can cover a distance of 4 miles.

details.name: Kidswatcher
details.potential: The Kidswatcher could be used to track children in school, daycare, family outings, or at any time where there is the potential for children to become lost.

details.name: Move
details.potential: All sensor data is accessible via the official API.

details.name: M1
details.potential: The M1 could be used to receive simple text based alerts from a smartphone. This would increase efficiency in communication.

details.name: Jet
details.potential: SDK and API available for developers.

details.name: Z-Watch
details.potential: The SmartQ Z-Watch can act as an excellent tool for communicating mission critical information to front-line workers. Its durable, waterproof casing enables it in out-door environments. Mission critical information can be communicated to the watch over a wireless network. An internal vibrator can act as an excellent way to get a workers attention even when they are distracted with other tasks.

details.name: ZGPAX S5
details.potential: The ZGPAX S5 can act as an excellent tool for communicating mission critical information to front-line workers. Mission critical information can be communicated to the watch over a wireless network.
